name.th: ใบหน้ายืดใหญ่

short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Elastic Face is a quirky puzzle game where you stretch, bounce. Try it now!
short.ca: La Cara Elàstica és un joc de trencaclosques estrany on treballes, botzeges. Prova-ho ara!
short.es: ¡Elastic Face es un curioso juego de rompecabezas donde puedes estirar y rebotar! ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Copper Face er et sær puzzle-spil, hvor du strækker, spænder. Prøv det nu!
short.fi: Joustava naama on omalaatuinen pulmapeli, jossa venytät ja pomputtelet. Kokeile nyt!
short.fil: Ang Elastic Face ay isang kakaibang laro ng puzzle kung saan ikaw ay mag-stretch at mag-bounce. Subukan mo na!
short.he: Elastic Face es un peculiar juego de rompecabezas en el que estiras y rebotas. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.hi: Elastic Face er et sær puzzle spil, hvor du strækker, hopper. Prøv det nu!
short.hr: Elastično lice je čudna puzzle igra u kojoj istežete, odbijate. Isprobajte je sada!
short.hu: Elastic Face egy furcsa puzzle játék, ahol nyújtózkodsz, pattogsz. Próbáld ki most!
short.id: Elastic Face es un juego de rompecabezas peculiar donde estiras y rebotas. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.it: Il viso elastico è un singolare gioco di puzzle dove ci si allunga e si rimbalza. Provalo ora!
short.ko: 탄성 페이스는 신비로운 퍼즐 게임으로, 늘리고 튕김을 경험해 보세요. 지금 바로 즐겨보세요!
short.lt: Il gioco di puzzle Elastic Face è strano, dove puoi allungarti e rimbalzare. Provalo ora!
short.lv: Elastīgs sejums ir ekscentriska puzlspēle, kurā jūs izstiepjat un atstarojat. Pamēģiniet tagad!
short.ms: Elastic Face est un jeu de puzzle original où vous étirez, rebondissez. Essayez-le maintenant !
short.nl: Elastic Face is een eigenaardig puzzelspel waarbij je rekt, stuitert. Probeer het nu!
short.no: ¡Elastic Face es un peculiar juego de rompecabezas donde puedes estirar y rebotar! ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.ro: Fața Elastică este un joc de puzzle ciudat în care îți întinzi, sări. Încearcă acum!
short.ru: Эластичное лицо - это забавная головоломка, в которой вы растягиваете, отскакиваете. Попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Elastičen obraz je čudaška puzzle igra, kjer raztegujte, poskakujete. Poskusite zdaj!
short.th: หน้า Elastic เป็นเกมปริศนาที่น่าสนใจที่คุณสามารถยืดและกระเด็นได้ ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.uk: Elastic Face เป็นเกมปริศนาที่น่าสนใจที่คุณสามารถยืดและกระโดด ลองกันเลย!
short.vi: Elastic Face là một trò chơi trí tuệ lạ lùng nơi bạn căng và nảy. Hãy thử ngay!
short.zh_CN: 弹性面部是一个古怪的益智游戏，在这里你可以拉伸、弹跳。现在就来试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 彈性臉是一款古怪的益智遊戲，您可以拉伸、彈跳。現在就試試看吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduce:
"Elastic Face" offers a unique and entertaining arcade experience where you can freely interact with a character's elastic face.

Description:
Unwind and relieve stress by simply dragging and pinching the character's face with your mouse. There are no specific tasks to complete; you're free to play as you like. Watch the skin deform and return with fascinating movements resembling waves.

Pinch, stretch, and deform the face in any direction. Release the mouse to see it return to its original state, no matter how much you distort it. The cute features like the small nose, open mouth, and flexible eyes add to the fun.

Features:
Enjoyable and fun gameplay with easy controls.
High-quality graphics and delightful effects.
A stress-relieving experience with no set missions.

How to play:
Click and drag your mouse to interact with the face, releasing it to restore its original shape. It's that simple!

Play more games on the top-left menu
